K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283a-0: @283a 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol ta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283a-5: sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283a-6: gsang chen dang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283a-8: rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-0: de skad @283b ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-2: gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-5: shin tu thub par dka' ba yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-6: 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-8: khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-9: gsang ba med par las mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-13: rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bde blag tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi ming brgyad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-15: gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-16: lag na rdo rje khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-17: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-18: log 'dren bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-19: gang thos na tshangs par ma spyad ba yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-20: thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:283b-21: smyung bar ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-1: sbyong ma yin pa yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la srung bar mdzad pa dang las kyi dngos grub kyang stsol bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-7: gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-14: glang po che'i rna ba can yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-16: rgyan bzang po dang ldan pa yin; khyod ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-23: gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-24: khyod ni; 'bar ba'i me lce dang ldan pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-27: khyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa dag gis thos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-28: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bar du sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284a-30: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshem du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-0: @284b na bzhugs shing de dag de la chos ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-1: chos bstan pa des na de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-6: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-11: so me so me su khi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-14: bhi ri bi sa ni sindya ntu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-15: sarba k'arya ni s'a dha ya manta p'a da: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-19: 'di ltar gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-22: de de lags so; ;de de lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-24: rig pa mchog sgrub pa na bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-25: sgrub pa'i tshe mchod pa bgyis la ming brgyad pa bklag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-26: bklags na bdag bstod par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-27: dga' na dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-29: lha rnams kyang dga' nas myur du dngos grub stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-31: rmi lam ngan pa mthong bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:284b-32: sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lan 'bum du bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:285a-0: @285a *// sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:285a-1: mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa yang bskal pa bzang por byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes bdag mchi'o; ;lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-002:285a-3: lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
